ui module¶

This module creates a window that allows users to select parameters more easily. NOT YET FUNCTIONAL

Contains:

  • main()

ui.L_F1 = [[<PySimpleGUI.PySimpleGUI.Frame object>]]¶

UI elements for selecting frame 1.

ui.L_F2 = [[<PySimpleGUI.PySimpleGUI.Frame object>]]¶

UI elements for selecting frame 2.

ui.L_GO = [[<PySimpleGUI.PySimpleGUI.Frame object>]]¶

UI elements for triggering generation.

ui.L_INFO = [[<PySimpleGUI.PySimpleGUI.StatusBar object>]]¶

UI elements for window information.

ui.L_SPACER = [[<PySimpleGUI.PySimpleGUI.Text object>]]¶

UI elements for window information.

ui.display_status(status)¶

Updates status text in window.

Parameters

status (str) – text to insert
